abstract: French ceramics company Astier de Villatte introduces collection of tableware featuring birds, insects and household objects designed in collaboration with John Derian.
snippet: Astier de Villatte, the French company known for white ceramic tableware, is adding color and graphics to its dishes, a result of a collaboration with John Derian.
lead_paragraph: Astier de Villatte, the French company known for white ceramic tableware, is adding color and graphics to its dishes, a result of a collaboration with John Derian.

headline.main: Bored With White Tableware? Call John Derian
headline.print_headline: Bored With White? Call John Derian
headline.seo: Bored With White Tableware? Call John Derian
